alert.note: Alert for Clark; Cleveland; Dallas; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Ouachita; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 10:23PM CDT until November 04 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Eastern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Grant County in central Arkansas... Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... North central Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Garland County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Saline County in central Arkansas... Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... South central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1023 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles west of Leola, or 15 miles east of Arkadelphia, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Benton... Bryant... Malvern... Sheridan... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Rockport... Caddo Valley... Traskwood... Leola... Tull... Sparkman... Carthage... Prattsville... Poyen... Perla... Cane Creek... Jenkins Ferry State Park... East End... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and southwestern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and southwestern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Cleveland; Dallas; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Ouachita; Pulaski; Saline
